text: Harold Best (18 December 1937 – 24 August 2020) was a Labour Party politician. He was Member of Parliament (MP) for Leeds North West from the 1997 general election until he retired at the 2005 general election. He was a trade unionist. Best died on 24 August 2020, aged 82. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Labour Party (UK) MPs Category:UK MPs 1997–2001 Category:UK MPs 2001–2005 Category:Politicians from Leeds
title: Harold Best
